sentences.sContent: I now ask you to recognize the Christ within, and to return to me my humanness.
sentences.sContent_eng: I now ask you to recognize the Christ within, and to return to me my humanness.
sentences.sCn: 现在我要求你们发现自己的内在基督，把我的人性还给我。

sentences.sContent: Only two of them, however, are needed to explain the uncanny valley. These are humanness and eeriness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only two of them, however, are needed to explain the uncanny valley. These are humanness and eeriness.
sentences.sCn: 然而，这四者中只有两个可以用来解释“恐怖谷”，那就是人性和怪诞性。

sentences.sContent: This is the inner child or your ego; it is your humanness, however you may call it.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the inner child or your ego; it is your humanness, however you may call it.
sentences.sCn: 这是你的内在小孩或小我；是你的人性，随便你怎么称呼它。

words.tran: 变得有人性；变得仁慈；有教化力（等于humanize）
教化；赋予人性；使通人情
